nodes.text: The Flower Queen was a powerful goddess who ruled the Spring Season of the forest moon of Endor. She could only bring about spring with the Season scepter. She was the sister of the Leaf Queen, the Sun King, and the Snow King.

Joseph Bongiorno's novella Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon includes the Flower Queen and her siblings among the supernatural entities discussed, but after being canceled several times was released through unofficial channels in October 2018. The information that was to be published in the article is outlined below.
